description: Feel and look your best every time you get out there in our Men’s Intraknit™ Thermal Merino Base Layer Pattern 1/2 Zip Hoodie. This men's first layer uses Merino Sport yarn, which combines the natural power of Merino wool with the durability of polyester for more confident pursuits. But don't forget about the comfort. Our revolutionary Intraknit™ technology and body-mapping techniques allows us to put warmth, ventilation, and mobility everywhere you need it. So you can work up a sweat without worrying about your gear slowing you down.
name: Smartwool Intraknit Thermal Merino Base Layer Pattern 1/2 Zip Hoodie - Mens
